ajaxbrowser.webkit module¶

Interface to qt webkit for loading and interacting with JavaScript dependent webpages

class ajaxbrowser.webkit.Browser(gui=False, user_agent='WebKit', proxy=None, load_images=True, load_javascript=True, load_java=True, load_plugins=True, timeout=20, delay=5, app=None, use_cache=False)[source]¶

Bases: PyQt4.QtGui.QWidget

add_shortcuts()[source]¶

Define shortcuts for convenient interaction

attr(pattern, name, value=None)[source]¶

For the elements that match this pattern, set attribute if value is defined, else return the value.

click(pattern='input')[source]¶

Click all elements that match the pattern.

Uses standard CSS pattern matching: http://www.w3.org/TR/CSS2/selector.html Returns the number of elements clicked

closeEvent(event)[source]¶

Catch the close window event and stop the script

current_html()[source]¶

Return current rendered HTML

current_text()[source]¶

Return text from the current rendered HTML

current_url()[source]¶

Return current URL

fill(pattern, value)[source]¶

Set text of the matching elements to value, and return the number of elements matched.

find(pattern)[source]¶

Returns the elements matching this CSS pattern.

finished(reply)[source]¶

Override this method in subclasses to process downloaded urls

fullscreen()[source]¶

Alternate fullscreen mode

home()[source]¶

Go back to initial page in history

js(script)[source]¶

Shortcut to execute javascript on current document and return result

keys(pattern, text)[source]¶

Simulate typing by focusing on elements that match the pattern and triggering key events. Returns the number of elements matched.

load(url, html=None, headers=None, data=None)[source]¶

Load given url in webkit and return html when loaded

url: the URL to load html: optional HTML to set instead of downloading headers: the headers to attach to the request data: the data to POST

run()[source]¶

Run the Qt event loop so can interact with the browser

save()[source]¶

Save the current HTML state to disk

screenshot(output_file)[source]¶

Take screenshot of current webpage and save results

set_proxy(proxy)[source]¶

Shortcut to set the proxy

update_address(url)[source]¶

Set address of the URL text field

wait(timeout=1)[source]¶

Wait for delay time

wait_load(pattern, timeout=60)[source]¶

Wait for this content to be loaded up to maximum timeout. Returns True if pattern was loaded in the time limit.

wait_quiet(timeout=20)[source]¶

Wait until all requests have completed up to a maximum timeout. Returns True if all requests complete before the timeout.
